storyInfo: While secretly transporting key modules from the ship, Rhodes Island comes under a premeditated attack—but thanks to the Doctor and elite operators, the threat is successfully neutralized.

attributes.content: You asked me why the first 'language' I shared with you after our thoughts resonated was 'death'...
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: I really don't know either.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Aboard this strange, colossal vessel called 'Rhodes Island,' the Cautus can barely feel the passage of time.
It makes her uneasy. Ever since the day she became Infected, time has meant everything to her.
Time will bring her death—and perhaps, liberation.
However, the beings who dwell in this strange place—yet deny they are gods—seem utterly indifferent to it.
Maybe it's because I've never been afraid of dying. Death is nothing more than a passage to a new environment.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Pessimist.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: That's how they would describe you in your own language, yes?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: A pessimist? I don't think so.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: The Cautus blurts it out, and regrets it—just a little. She had agreed with many of the clergy's arguments back during those debates… but now that she's here, does she still need to think in those terms?
Does she really care about everything she experienced before the collapse?
After all, even time has forsaken her now.
I once worked in a mine that seemed to be endless. To maintain efficiency, the overseer would kill or drive off any bothersome Originium slugs.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Originium slugs? A mine?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: Yes. Those Originium slugs are even weaker than me, and the mines... the mines were once my home.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: But the overseer didn't expect that the kindest worker in the mine was secretly feeding and caring for the Originium slugs they were trying to drive away—which only drew more of them into the mine.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Eventually, the slugs disrupted the mine's foundation, leading to a collapse.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: But you survived?
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: The slugs' secretions fed me.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: In such a harsh environment, many of them lived short lives, yet new ones kept being born. They gave me strength—
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Miners, Originium slugs, and yourself—but your story ignores the 'death of Terra,' Hierda.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: You do not treasure your 'Terra'.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: That's not true at all! In our language, 'Terra Bless Us' is a phrase that invokes something almost divine—
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Hmm... you still have a very limited definition of 'life'.
attributes.name: Raydistorter

attributes.content: I don't understand. You've shown me so many individuals, each starkly distinct from the next… You all feel love and hate just as we do—and yet, are still vastly different from each other.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: 'Salvaging death from the grave'—you all live united by a purpose that I can't understand.
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: But why have I come here?
The Cautus ponders this question, but her intuition tells her the answer lies with the person who just extended a hand to her.

She looks out the porthole at the top of the cabin into the cold, silent, endless expanse of space. The light from the distant, giant sphere once again passes over the dead planet, piercing the Cautus's eyes.
However, despite her blurry vision, she spots a small silhouette within the light.
There is... someone out there, in deep space?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Is that the one I'm looking for?
attributes.name: Hierda

attributes.content: Someone out in the depths of space seems to hear the Cautus's voice—a shadow within the light stirs ever so slightly.
(Unknown language) You're looking for me?
attributes.name: Voice From Within

attributes.content: One circle, two circles, the little dots are spinning in the darkness.
They're accelerating, coming closer and closer.
They rip a hole in the darkness, and a bright, blazing beam of light shines through.
I extend my arms and embrace them.
Core body temperature is elevated; nerve blocker has already been administered.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Body temperature rising rapidly. Prepare to administer muscle relaxant and replenish blood volume.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Repeat the medication again, and let's start the operation—
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Dr. Warfarin?
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Did I doze off again? Maybe I'm just really exhausted.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Don't try and speak now. Your throat is badly injured.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You feel like you went to sleep?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yes, and I had a long dream.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: You didn't feel any other discomfort?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Erm... no. Did something happen just now, Dr. Warfarin?
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Nothing major. Did you dream about anything... special?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Anything special? That's hard to say.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: In my dreams there were balls of mud spinning around each other on black velvet...
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: They are now big, now small. One moment they were smaller than children's marbles, the next larger than the whole of Victoria.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Someone picked them up and flung them back out. They started smashing into each other and bursting like fireworks, but the whole time, I didn't hear a sound.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Anything else...?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I also saw threads—stretching from one ball of mud to another, each one made of light. And on every thread, there were people—running outward, racing along the light.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: I followed them. I ran to a white patch of earth. It was completely empty...
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Save for a single stone tablet standing there.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Stone tablet? What was written on it?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Nothing, Dr. Warfarin, and that's when I woke up.
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: What a strange dream, but then again, you remember it quite clearly, which means your brain's memory module is still functioning properly.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The more clearly you remember your dream, the closer you were to waking up when you dreamed it. As I see it, the fact that you were able to remember your dream is a very good thing.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Say, I haven't seen Dr. Touch today...
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: She has other matters to attend to. She told me to give this to you. Look.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Huh? The spring, the gears... the hands... all the parts that make up a clock!
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: She said it would help relieve your stress.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Dr. Warfarin, is Rhodes Island in some kind of trouble again?
attributes.name: Chloe

attributes.content: Little one, you've come to the wrong place.
(Unsurprisingly, Beepy got lost.)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: (Hiding in fear)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: It seems like Closure failed to examine your program modules.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Little one, this item here should definitely not be on your maintenance list.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: The Goliath lifts it gently and examines it curiously in his hands.
(Angrily spins treads)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: What a huge change. It was empty when Her Highness left.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Now, there are so many interesting people and things here, right?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Ascalon.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Tell them not to worry. I'll take care of the mobility layer.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Ascalon, you seem in poorer spirits than you were when you returned from Victoria.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: What about all the people working under you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: They have been dispatched to create the Isolation Zone outside the ship. I'm remaining on this ship, and that's sufficient.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Rhodes Island does indeed need a blade that moves through the darkness, but that doesn't mean that you need to consciously remain silent.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Come chat with me when you have time. I have liquor here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Besides, I want you to tell me about Theresis.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: I witnessed the beginning of that heroic epic, and you witnessed its end. What we saw was very different.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I will convey your thoughts to the Doctor and Amiya when they have time.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The Goliath places 'Beepy' in front of the exit passage.
Stop wandering around—the mobility layer is dangerous. Don't underestimate what high-concentrations of Originium can do to someone like you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: I'll keep my eye on the work here, and that'll be enough.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.content: (Runs away in a panic)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: Dame Kal'tsit, what could've gotten you this tense?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Boiler Worker

attributes.text: PRTS Operation Record: [Confidential] Escort Catastrophe warning system and medical center core components

attributes.content: Situation abnormal. Enemy weapons technology exceeds mission parameters. Risk of exposure present.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Possible enemy signal detection capability. Shutting down drone transmission temporarily.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Logos, I'm counting on you for the drone's live feed.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'm ready.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: 'Circuits.' Etched into Originium through spoken words—drawn by hand to reveal what the swarm perceives.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Logos's bone pen hovers in the air, automatically transcribing the images recorded by the drone.
Twelve flexible vehicles buried in the sand. Thirty-one armed militants.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The five sniper's nests have already been marked. There seems to be a signal isolation device in the tent, which the scanner cannot penetrate.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: All are carrying unidentified weapons. Threat level unknown. Further on-site confirmation required—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Raidian, you're up next. I'm starting the drone recall procedure.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: In position!
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Wait a second. Can you see me?
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: The bone pen taps lightly—its strokes weaving together the rough outline of a human form.
Raidian gives a tentative wave to the two people watching the feed, and even in floating text, her smile comes through clearly.
We are standing by, ready to assist you.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's no problem. In ninety seconds, your drone and I will leave together.
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: On screen, Raidian walks into the signal-blocking tent as if no one else is there—and the transmission cuts out.
Bzzzz—
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Logos?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: We're ready to launch a full assault at any time—the incantations have already drifted on the wind to the edge of their camp.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Bzzzt—Done! All intel's been transcribed. I'll be back in a sec!
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: It didn't create even a single stir—I overwrote the visual signals received by each target's brain.
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Chances are, all they saw was a mischievous little sandbeast slipping into the tent to escape the wind and sand.
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Mechanist, how goes it? Did you discover anything while parsing the intel reports?
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: All weapons have had their origins erased and have been modified to suit their operators.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: But I'm familiar with how to operate it. Doctor discussed its rather rare design with me just recently.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: They are from Ægir.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Ægir? But the people who are going to interface with us, aren't they also...?
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: Regardless, the threat has been cleared.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We must not yield to such a threat and allow it to interfere with our equipment transfer—nor can we create any disruption that could alert the personnel involved.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The matter is of great importance and needs to be resolved quietly.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: PRTS Operation Record: [Confidential] Ensure the transfer and installation of mining modules

attributes.content: There is no way. They're wearing special protective equipment to ward off our physical attacks.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard

attributes.content: This was arranged in advance—they even knew our personnel layout.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Sniper

attributes.content: Orchid, stay back, they're clearly after our mining module.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard

attributes.content: Figures. I knew I'd end up working overtime again.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Spot, support Midnight and Catapult.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Popukar, have you called for reinforcements?
attributes.name: Orchid
Popukar
attributes.content: Yeah... I called already.

attributes.name: Popukar
attributes.content: Orchid, be careful!
Hmm... futile. As for the others...
attributes.name: Attacker

attributes.content: Where is that sound coming from?!
attributes.name: Attacker

attributes.content: You really have prepared well. Unfortunately, you're not quite strong enough to handle Arts.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: No, that's not right. It shouldn't be you.
attributes.name: Attacker

attributes.text: 'Shh. Even your heart has gone silent.'

attributes.content: I'll deal with the injured. That said, Midnight is getting too worked up again.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Orchid, I'll have to trouble you to deal with him.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Leave him to me.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: The Doctor guessed correctly. Someone leaked the details of our operations.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: Wrap this up quickly. Tow the backup mining ship to the nearest nomadic city and get the energy bay patched up.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: Then return to the ship at once to avoid any mishaps.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: P-Pith, why are you our backup?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: PRTS told me it would be Misery...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: You followed a hunch?
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: A last-minute change in plans right before departure; I'm just worried that...
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.options: Misery, Stormeye, Sharp and such have other plans.

attributes.content: Do we need to inform the rest of our colleagues via PRTS?
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.options: If everything goes well, I was worrying over nothing.;If anything goes wrong, resolve the issue as quickly as possible and then return to defend the ship.

attributes.text: PRTS Operation Record: [Confidential] Escort Logistics and Engineering Department members to Kazdel

attributes.content: How many waves of mercenaries have attacked us already today?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: This is the seventh wave now.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: They may not be too threatening, but it's really strange how many of them have been attacking us every day this past week.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: We've only just crossed Kazdel's border.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: These guys do not fear death. They remind me of the mercenaries we met in Sargon.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Faithless.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Misery, what's taking you so long? We planned for you to be back by now.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: You should know that this place is still quite some distance from the Scar Market.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Even if I knew every shortcut around here, it would still take me some time.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: What has the investigation revealed so far?
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: For the past two weeks, someone's been routing the majority of Scar Market's orders here, through a network of outsourcers.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: There's no way to trace the client—they've covered their tracks well.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: In other words, it was just 'bad luck' that we ran into these mercs?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: They're not actively coming to attack us?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I'm afraid so.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: It seems that not all of the worries Doctor had before we departed were unfounded.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Everyone, there's news from the sentries.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Another group of mercenaries is shifting toward our position. There's a high chance we'll be engaging them again soon.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: (Sighs)
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Misery, something's not right here.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: These unending waves of mercenaries don't seem to be trying to harm us. Instead... it's like they're...
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Trying to delay us.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: We can stay here and continue escorting the team. You all can return to the ship now.
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: Don't worry, Fang.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Some folks are going to find it harder than they thought to put their schemes into motion.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: The air is fluctuating.
Is that wind?
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: No, is that... the Lifebone?!
attributes.name: Fang

attributes.content: High above the sky, a massive skeleton has emerged, stirring the dust of history and casting a vast shadow below.
For many at Rhodes Island, it is their first time seeing the massive skeleton that once appeared during the chaos in Victoria.
What a sight...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Engineering Operator

attributes.content: While investigating the Scar Market, I took a trip to Kazdel to meet a few old friends.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Let's leave the rest to them.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: We should go home.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I've already silenced all communications in visible range. Engaging now.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: (Blows bone whistle)
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Hmph. Their weapons counter my gear, but they offer little resistance against your bone whistle and incantations.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Far from it. They just don't quite understand the rules of my speech yet.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I'm curious about the thought process the Ægirs followed in developing such precise weaponry.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Then I'll grab a few pieces to take back and dismantle—I'll help you study them.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Come on you two! We are carrying out a mission here!
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: There are at least three squads waiting in ambush up ahead. We can't take them all on.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: I'm afraid we can't handle this cleanly and quietly anymore—we'll need to tell our people to brace for the assault.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: Hey! Hey! Hey! The reinforcements the Doctor called for are here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Raidian, Mechanist, mark the location for us. The Bad Guy will be there soon!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze?!
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Check your communication devices. I synchronized our location with you.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wait a moment, Rosmontis, didn't we agree I'd rush in first and draw their fire away from you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'll control the Arts.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Finished?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I checked the signals in the surrounding area. They've all been cleared out.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: Uhh... who can tell me what this thing really is?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: When it tried to self-destruct, I had to use all of my strength just to stop it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The people interfacing with us are also Ægirs. Why are they attacking our people and equipment?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Let Dr. Kal'tsit and the Doctor determine that.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Ensure that we return to the ship as soon as our personnel and equipment are safely transferred to Clementia.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: We need to deal with these issues as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: There are still other unknown leakers out there. This is just the beginning, I'm afraid.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: That's strange, why is PRTS responding even slower now? Or is it just my imagination?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This isn't right, no. Let me check it again.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: PRTS, output all back-end logs from the past two weeks.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Uhuh. No problems here....and no problems here either...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No problems anywhere?
attributes.name: Closure
